---
title: "Definitions of functions"
output: html_notebook
---

install.packages() - to install new packages
library() - loads a package
read_csv() - to load a csv into r
<- - used to define a data set
= - used to define a variable
%>% pipe operator, basically means "and then do"
mutate() - lets you create new or edit variables from existing
as.Date() - transforms a varable into a date format
.$ specificies a variable from a data set, useful to find long and un tidy names
across() - applies a function to many variables within a dataset
factor() - turns a variable into a factor
as.numeric( - turns a variable into a number)
